Find out more about the Annual Gold Card .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Add your discount to your Oyster card"}
You need to add your Gold Card discount to your Oyster card to get discounted pay as you go fares.
A member of staff can add your discount, at:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Tube, London Overground and TfL Rail stations"," \u003ca href=\"http://www.nationalrail.co.uk/stations_destinations/\"\u003eSome National Rail ticket offices\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps/oyster-ticket-stops\"\u003eOyster Ticket Stops\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e "]}
You'll need to show your ticket or Gold Record Card.
When you renew your annual ticket, you'll need to add the discount to your Oyster card again.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Can I get it?"}
You get a Gold Card, or Gold Record Card if you:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Buy an adult-rate Annual Travelcard on an Oyster card, National Rail smartcard or paper and you're issued with a Gold Record Card","Buy an adult-rate point to point season ticket for journeys that start and end in the \u003ca href=\"http://www.nationalrail.co.uk/Gold%20Card%20Dgm%20Key.pdf\"\u003eAnnual Gold Card area\u003c/a\u003e "]}
You can buy your annual ticket at a station and you'll also get your Gold Record Card.
If you order online, we'll send your Gold Record Card in the post. You're not eligible for discounts until you have it.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"How to use"}
Carry your Annual Gold Card or Gold Record Card and Oyster card, with the discount added, with you at all times. Don't let anyone else use them.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Not received or lost your Gold Record Card?"}
If you've not received or lost your Gold Record Card, call us on 0343 222 1234 ( call charges may apply ).
When you receive your new Gold Record Card, you'll need to add your discount to your Oyster card again.
